bug.author: Lijo050
bug.description:
/kind bug I'm not able to delete Kubeflow and free the pvc. <denchmark-code>$ ../kubeflow/bootstrap/bin/kfctl delete all -V INFO[0000] Downloading /Users/xyz/ds-kubeflow/app.yaml to /var/folders/5r/kswhy6x54wv_cnf4b59wc58c0000gn/T/572531860/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:348" INFO[0000] Writing stripped KfDef to /Users/xyz/ds-kubeflow/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:659" INFO[0000] Downloading /Users/xyz/ds-kubeflow/app.yaml to /var/folders/5r/kswhy6x54wv_cnf4b59wc58c0000gn/T/868764387/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:348" INFO[0000] Initializing a default restConfig for Kubernetes filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:243" INFO[0003] deleting namespace: kubeflow filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:411" Error: couldn't delete KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: kfApp Delete failed for kustomize: (kubeflow.error): Code 400 with message: couldn't delete namespace kubeflow Error: Operation cannot be fulfilled on namespaces "kubeflow": The system is ensuring all content is removed from this namespace. Upon completion, this namespace will automatically be purged by the system. Usage: kfctl delete [all(=default)|k8s|platform] [flags]
Flags: --delete_storage Set if you want to delete app's storage cluster used for mlpipeline. -h, --help help for delete -V, --verbose verbose output default is false
couldn't delete KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: kfApp Delete failed for kustomize: (kubeflow.error): Code 400 with message: couldn't delete namespace kubeflow Error: Operation cannot be fulfilled on namespaces "kubeflow": The system is ensuring all content is removed from this namespace. Upon completion, this namespace will automatically be purged by the system. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-code>$ kubectl get pvc -n kubeflow NAME STATUS VOLUME CAPACITY ACCESS MODES STORAGECLASS AGE katib-mysql Bound pvc-c5ea5ff4-e0ee-11e9-a9f7-7e7cb0ee76e8 10Gi RWO default 17d metadata-mysql Bound pvc-c95765a3-e0ee-11e9-a9f7-7e7cb0ee76e8 10Gi RWO default 17d minio-pv-claim Bound pvc-d0f4490f-e0ee-11e9-a9f7-7e7cb0ee76e8 20Gi RWO default 17d mysql-pv-claim Bound pvc-d196c4d1-e0ee-11e9-a9f7-7e7cb0ee76e8 20Gi RWO default 17d </denchmark-code>
Is there any other way to clean and free up the resources? <denchmark-code>$ kubectl get pods -n kubeflow NAME READY STATUS RESTARTS AGE admission-webhook-bootstrap-stateful-set-0 1/1 Running 0 17d admission-webhook-deployment-6f4d64854f-dscxw 1/1 Running 0 17d application-controller-stateful-set-0 1/1 Running 0 17d argo-ui-bd5b697b4-ghzw5 1/1 Running 0 17d centraldashboard-fb5944d8d-2zgpx 1/1 Running 0 17d jupyter-web-app-deployment-688b7bc578-4q99d 1/1 Running 0 17d katib-controller-8758d74f4-4f9tv 1/1 Running 1 17d katib-db-65966f85f-zh5x7 1/1 Running 0 17d katib-manager-846f68f598-p5mwq 0/1 CrashLoopBackOff 7735 17d katib-manager-rest-7cdd57b69b-r746t 1/1 Running 0 17d katib-suggestion-bayesianoptimization-77d7c8fb7b-gg4w2 1/1 Running 0 17d katib-suggestion-grid-7cbf64d74b-7ctlg 1/1 metadata-deployment-6f4c4f9d5c-h9dzt 0/1 CrashLoopBackOff 4010 17d metadata-deployment-6f4c4f9d5c-wv95x 0/1 CrashLoopBackOff 4051 17d metadata-ui-547b468655-5hjbc 1/1 Running 0 17d The problem is still there kfctl v1.0.1-0-gf3edb9b. Why are you closing the bug?
